summary: Netflix guided Q1 2026 revenue at $12.16B vs Q1 2025 $10.54B = 15.3% YoY at guidance. Netflix typically beats by 0.5-1.5%. FY2026 guidance: $51B (+14% YoY).
content:
Key data points:
- Q1 2025 revenue: $10,542,801,000 (denominator for resolution)
- Q1 2026 Netflix guidance: $12.16B revenue
- At guidance YoY growth: 15.3%
- Q4 2025 actual: $12.05B vs $11.96B guidance (0.8% beat), 17.6% YoY
- FY 2025: $45.2B (+16% YoY)
- FY 2026 guidance: $50.7-51.7B midpoint $51B (+14% YoY)
- Ad revenue: $1.5B in 2025, targeting $3B in 2026
- 325M paid subscribers
- Analysts noted Q1 guidance was slightly light vs expectations
- Warner Bros. acquisition pending (all-cash bid)
